title: Has China discovered medicine for CoVID 19? - Quora

response.answer_text: In a joint research among Chinese scientists including institutions like the CSA, they have found two chemicals that is safe and effective to stop covid 19 reproduction. The paper is published as the cover of the new issue of Science. But there's a long way between effective chemicals and targeted medicine.
I don’t know and you shouldn’t ask me this question. You should ask CIA, who know everything about China, especially those information which Chinese themselves don’t know.
